text:
@realDonaldTrump sweet lord THERE IS NO LIMIT TO YOUR SHAMELESSNESS - on the one hand you day the corona virus is nothing to worry about - on the other  your racism, medieval, shitty wall/travel ban is now somehow a step you took in hindsight to stop the problem that is the corona virus ...
#MAGA
